      • getTabSettingsName

        public net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation getTabSettingsName()
        Returns:
        The tab name that will be used to store TerminalStorageState settings inside a tab. This can be used to modify in what tab certain settings are stored.

      • handleClick

        public boolean handleClick(net.minecraft.inventory.container.Container container,
                           int channel,
                           int hoveringStorageSlot,
                           int mouseButton,
                           boolean hasClickedOutside,
                           boolean hasClickedInStorage,
                           int hoveredContainerSlot)
        Description copied from interface: ITerminalStorageTabClient
        Called when a mouse click happens in a gui.
        Specified by:
        handleClick in interface ITerminalStorageTabClient<TerminalStorageSlotIngredient<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack,java.lang.Integer>>
        Overrides:
        handleClick in class TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentClient<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack,java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        container - The active container.
        channel - The active channel.
        hoveringStorageSlot - The storage slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
        mouseButton - The mouse button.
        hasClickedOutside - If the player has clicked outside the gui.
        hasClickedInStorage - If the player has clicked inside the storage space. This can be true even if the storage slot is -1.
        hoveredContainerSlot - The container slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
        Returns:
        If further click processing should stop.
